Articles.Content: Has anybody made any modded command modules for .16 that have hatches? EVAing from stock is getting old.
There are some, ExPI contains air lock modules that can be used as pods, there's the new KOSMOS VA capsule, and maybe a few others...
RedStars ejection seat has soon EVA. hopefully.. =)

I'm working on a few command pods too.

They will not be released any time soon though since I first want to fix and change my current part pack which will take some time I think.
